WorkItem.Description: Any chance you can add support for VS 2012 Express for Windows Phone? This is the version that comes with the WP8 SDK. Thanks
WorkItem.PlannedForRelease: MVVM Light Toolkit V4.1 for Visual Studio 2012

Comments.Message:
Hi,

Unfortunately I cannot provide support for an SDK as long as the SDK is not released to the public. Can you contact me per email though?

Thanks,
Laurent
The V4.1 which was released on the same day as the WP8 SDK supports Visual Studio express.

WP 8 is supported in the PCL version here:
https://nuget.org/packages/Portable.MvvmLightLibs
